name: A Simple Quest
description:
In this short RPG for the Black and White Jam 8, you play as an adventurer who sets out on a quest to return the King's stolen heirloom.  Choose a class with special abilities, fight monsters, and complete your quest!

Controls

  • Up - W / D-Pad Up
  • Down - S / D-Pad Down
  • Left - A / D-Pad Left
  • Right - D / D-Pad Right
  • Inventory - I / DualShock Triangle / Xbox Y
  • Accept - Enter / Spacebar / DualShock Cross / Xbox A
  • Back - Escape / DualShock Cirlcle / Xbox B

Tip: It is entirely possible to play through without fighting a single fight.

External Assets

  • Kenney's 1-Bit Pack
  • PressStart2P.ttf by Coderman38
